mapper.select: select a.chnno, IFNULL(aa.amount,0) as allAmount,IFNULL(d.fill_amount,0) as fillAmount,IFNULL(e.repay_amount,0) as repayAmount,IFNULL(f.chn_commission,0) as chnCommission,IFNULL(f.commission,0) as commission, IFNULL(f.order_count,0) as orderCount,IFNULL(g.user_count,0) as addUser from cloud_chn_code a left join (select chnno,sum(balance+contract_amount) as amount from cloud_user group by chnno) aa on a.chnno=aa.chnno left join (select a.chnno,sum(b.amount) as fill_amount from cloud_user a left join cloud_fund_history b on a.id = b.uid where b.type=1 and b.`status`=1 and DATE_FORMAT(b.time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by a.chnno) d on a.chnno = d.chnno left join (select a.chnno,sum(b.amount) as repay_amount from cloud_user a left join cloud_fund_history b on a.id = b.uid where b.type=2 and b.`status`=1 and DATE_FORMAT(b.time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by a.chnno) e on a.chnno = e.chnno left join (select chnno,count(1) as order_count ,sum(commission) as commission,IFNULL(sum(commission)-sum(coupon_commission),0) as chn_commission from cloud_order where DATE_FORMAT(clear_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (status=2 or status=3) group by chnno) f on a.chnno = f.chnno left join (select chnno,count(1) as user_count from cloud_user where DATE_FORMAT(crt_tm,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by chnno ) g on a.chnno= g.chnno;
